user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, reliable underwear that would keep me feeling good throughout the day.
purchase_reason: I chose this product primarily for its comfort and reliability. The breathable cotton and cooling features were appealing, as I wanted something that would keep me comfortable throughout the day. The positive reputation of the brand also played a significant role in my decision, as I trust Hanes for quality underwear.

My decision to purchase this item was influenced by the comfort it promised, particularly the soft cotton material and moisture-wicking properties. I was looking for something that would provide all-day comfort without irritation, and the brand's established reputation for quality reinforced my choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, soft, and true to size. I value versatility in clothing and footwear, as well as features that enhance comfort, such as cushioning and breathable materials. I appreciate items that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. Additionally, I tend to favor products that offer a good fit and are aesthetically pleasing, whether through color, design, or style. On the other hand, I dislike products made from hard or uncomfortable materials, as well as those that do not meet my expectations for softness or comfort. I also find poor fit or sizing issues unappealing, as they detract from the overall experience.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, reliable underwear. within my expected price range: [10.47, 17.44]
What specific size or style do you prefer for your underwear?
I prefer underwear that is true to size and comes in a classic, comfortable style.
What fabric do you prefer for your underwear, such as cotton, modal, or synthetic materials?
I prefer underwear made of soft cotton for comfort and breathability.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Eversoft Cotton Hipster Underwear, Tag Free & Breathable, Available in Plus Size> / Item ID: B0B15GQCC1 / Price: $9.29 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Start your day bright-eyed and cotton-bottomed with Fruit of the Loom®'s newly reinvented cotton hipsters. The style you love is now softer than ever and built for all day comfort. We've used a finer yarn to create a wonderfully soft feel that will have you ready to tackle the day. These hipsters come with a durable, plush-backed waistband that is guaranteed to remain ravel free wash after wash, and as always, our Fruit of the Loom® panties are tag free and made with a 100% cotton liner for ultimate comfort. These hipsters feature a moderate rise with full seat coverage."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear> / Item ID: B08YFLPPDM / Price: $14.18 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features the ultra soft waistband that won't pinch or bind. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Made from ultra soft, breathable ring-spun cotton these panties will keep you feeling fresh all day with Cool Comfort wicking technology. These panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Hipster Underwear."]
